TopicTitle: Korben's Taxi - Flying car from the movie The Fifth Element

Articles.Content:
[![title.jpg](http://www.whoshotdk.co.uk/KSP/Ships/SPH/KorbensTaxi/title.jpg)](http://www.whoshotdk.co.uk/KSP/Ships/SPH/KorbensTaxi/KorbensTaxi.craft)

DOWNLOAD

You might need to right-click that link and use 'Save As' or similar.

CONTROLS

[1] Toggle Jet VTOL engine

[2] Toggle forward thrust engines (for occasional use only; limited fuel)

[6] Toggle Front lights

[7] Toggle Rear lights

NOTES

Tends to roll a little bit on the ground but pretty stable once airborne, you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t need SAS though it will make flying somewhat easier with it switched on. Land gently (< 10m/s or so).

![1.jpg](http://www.whoshotdk.co.uk/KSP/Ships/SPH/KorbensTaxi/1.jpg)

![2.jpg](http://www.whoshotdk.co.uk/KSP/Ships/SPH/KorbensTaxi/2.jpg)

![3.jpg](http://www.whoshotdk.co.uk/KSP/Ships/SPH/KorbensTaxi/3.jpg)

![4.jpg](http://www.whoshotdk.co.uk/KSP/Ships/SPH/KorbensTaxi/4.jpg)

Enjoy!

LOL kewl.

 'You have two points on your license'. Great movie.

Nice job! It looks really cool)

P.S. Just yesterday I watched "The Fifth Element" again and today you post Korbin's taxi here. Is it a coincidence?![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
